metadata.title: CVE-2019-19048 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A memory leak in the crypto_reportstat() function indrivers/virt/vboxguest/vboxguest_utils.c in the Linux kernel before 5.3.9allows attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) bytriggering copy_form_user() failures, aka CID-e0b0cb938864.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
